page.title: 10Housing. Colour Schemes.
page.content: What is the most fashionable colour to paint the outside of your house in l985? Yes you're white! We looked at almost 4000 houses for signs of other colours - but in our block we found that with almost one in every two houses coated in the stuff it was a white wash. So where did that leave other colours? Brown used on l7% of houses was the runner up, mainly because we included fashionable new wood stains in with this colour. Blue l5% and Green ll% were the only other runners in the race. What ws the least popular colour? At under l% black seems to have almost dyed a death! Lobley Hill wins our 'Most Colourful Community Award' - white was the main colour on less than l5% of houses - but in Sunniside (2l60) an anaemic 68% of homes used a paler shade of white.
